body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.  
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of personal information.  
Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand.
The conversation should be at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time and end the conversation.
Return the conversation formatted like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hi, my name is Mark Gonzales, and I'm with Sparkling Clean Services. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, I'm Judy Collins. It's nice to meet you, Mark.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you too, Judy! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm having an issue with my billing; it seems there's been a mistake.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that. To help sort this out, could I have your account number, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's one two three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, and for security purposes, could you also provide your date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My birthday is April 2nd, one nine eight five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thanks for that information, Judy. Let me quickly look into your billing issue.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Mark. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Judy! It appears the mistake has been found and corrected. You should see the adjustment on your next statement.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That's wonderful news, Mark! I'm really happy to hear that.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Is there anything else I can help you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you for your assistance.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome! Thank you for contacting Sparkling Clean Services. Have a great day, Judy!
